item.title: Kubernetes
item.description: Kubernetes> Kubernetes # Kubernetes is a widely used open-source container cluster management system for automating the deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications. Initially developed by Google, it is now maintained by the Cloud Native Computing Foundation.

item.title: Service Mesh
item.description: Service Mesh> Service Mesh # A service mesh is a set of features for communication between microservices in a distributed environment. It aims to simplify the management of network interactions between services and provide reliable service quality for applications.
